overview: Brock Ketcher was born in California and raised in Minnesota. He is the middle child of a family of three. Over the past twenty years he has started a number of businesses ranging from business health insurance to real estate. In 1989 - 1994 he attended College at St Cloud State University. In 2009-2010 he attended ministry school at Bethel School of Supernatural Ministry in Redding, CA. In January of 2011 Brock came together with Luke Miner and Naomi Badu to change the face of online fundraising. The next eight months were spent planning and building an international website that has fast become the largest free fundraising platform on the internet. Today, YouCaring.com connects thousands of people everyday, helping individuals with some of their most challenging and life changing causes - free.
